IncidentDef.label: Favor
IncidentDef.description: Make a sacrifice without any worldly gains.
IncidentDef.letterText: felt a supernatural presence connect with them from beyond space and time

IncidentDef.label: Divine Inspiration
IncidentDef.description: Bast smiles upon your colonists, bestowing a random acts of inspiration upon them all

IncidentDef.label: Feline Aspect
IncidentDef.description: Trasforms your preacher with feline grace and claws.
IncidentDef.letterText: watches as their fingernails turn to claws and can now feel their newfound unnatural agility

IncidentDef.label: Summon Guardian
IncidentDef.description: Transform a beloved feline into a guardian.
IncidentDef.letterLabel: and have them smite your foes
IncidentDef.letterText: sees that your pet is absorbed in a flash of lite and is transformed into a ferocious beast

IncidentDef.label: Sanctuary
IncidentDef.description: Protects your settlement from most hostiles
IncidentDef.letterLabel: may your enemies flee in futility
IncidentDef.letterText: sighs in relief as your enemies flee

IncidentDef.label: Passage to A'aru
IncidentDef.description: [Game Ending Spell]\nThe small settlement is deemed worthy by Bast to enter A'aru.
IncidentDef.letterLabel: and cry out in supplication that she may gaze upon your small settlement and deem you worthy
IncidentDef.letterText: dons a mask and so is free
